I really like this new addition. I'm in my 50's & I LOVE GEOGRAPHY so this brushed up my skills quickly from school, long ago lol, so I can throw out the right test questions here & there to my grandkids, THANKS‼️
loved the serie

It is really interesting to see a crash course on geography, however geography is quite interesting when you have historical geography and population geography, geomorphology is quite boring as it is really hard to imagine certain processes like volcanic eruption and karst topography... I must suggest this video to my students
